name: Amanda Alvarez | science writer
body:
Hello/こんにちは/Terve! I'm a science writer living in Japan. Currently I do neuroscience-focused science communication at [RIKEN](http://www.brain.riken.jp/en/), Japan's biggest research lab in the Tokyo suburbs. I sometimes blog about #scicomm at [reflections](http://apostilb.github.io/reflections/). In a past life I did a PhD in [vision science](http://vision.berkeley.edu/). You might know me from Berkeley/Oakland/San Francisco, Geneva, Helsinki, Mainz, Milwaukee, New Haven, Oxford, Quantico, Rota, Washington DC.

### Contact

[@neuroamanda](https://twitter.com/neuroamanda) | neuroamanda at gmail
